Class FESI.Data.JSWrapper 

FESI.Data.JSWrapper
public class JSWrapper
implements JSObject
Package an EcmaScript object as a JSObject for use by the Netscape like interface.

evaluator
object

JSWrapper(ESObject, Evaluator)
Create a JSWraper for an EcmaScript object

JSWrapper 
 public JSWrapper(ESObject object,
                  Evaluator evaluator)
Create a JSWraper for an EcmaScript object

Parameters:
object - the EcmaScript object
evaluator - theEvaluator

getESObject 
 public ESObject getESObject()
getGlobalObject 
 public JSGlobalObject getGlobalObject()
Return the global object attached to this object

Returns:
the global object
call 
 public Object call(String methodName,
                    Object args[]) throws JSException
Implements the call the specified EcmaScript method of this object

Parameters:
methodName - The name of the method to call
args - An array of parameters.
Returns:
The result of the evaluation
Throws: JSException
For any error during interpretation
eval 
 public Object eval(String s) throws JSException
Implements the evaluation of a string with this object as the 'this' object. The string is considered a main program (top level return is not allowed)

Parameters:
s - The string to evaluate
Returns:
The result of the evaluation (null if no value returned)
Throws: JSException
For any error during interpretation
eval 
 public Object eval(Reader r,
                    String d) throws JSException
Evaluate a Reader stream with this object as the 'this' object. Consider the stream being a main program, not allowing the return statement.

Parameters:
r - The Reader stream to evaluate
d - A description of the Reader for error messages
Returns:
The result of the evaluation (null if no value returned)
Throws: JSException
For any error during interpretation
evalAsFunction 
 public Object evalAsFunction(Reader r,
                              String d) throws JSException
Evaluate a Reader stream with this object as the 'this' object. Consider the stream being a function program, allowing the return statement.

Parameters:
r - The Reader stream to evaluate
d - A description of the Reader for error messages
Returns:
The result of the evaluation (null if no value returned)
Throws: JSException
For any error during interpretation
evalAsFunction 
 public Object evalAsFunction(String s) throws JSException
Implements the evaluation of a string with this object as the 'this' object. The string is considered a function (top level return are allowed) Passing the specified parameters (names and values must have the same length)

Parameters:
s - The string to evaluate
Returns:
The result of the evaluation (null if no value returned)
Throws: JSException
For any error during interpretation
evalAsFunction 
 public Object evalAsFunction(Reader r,
                              String d,
                              String names[],
                              Object values[]) throws JSException
Evaluate a Reader stream with this object as the 'this' object. Consider the stream being a function program, allowing the return statement. Passing the specified parameters (names and values must have the same length)

Parameters:
r - The Reader stream to evaluate
d - A description of the Reader for error messages
names - the names of the parameters
values - the values of the parameters
Returns:
The result of the evaluation (null if no value returned)
Throws: JSException
For any error during interpretation
evalAsFunction 
 public Object evalAsFunction(String body,
                              String names[],
                              Object values[]) throws JSException
Implements the evaluation of a string with this object as the 'this' object. The string is considered a function (top level return are allowed)

Parameters:
body - The string to evaluate
names - the names of the parameters
values - the values of the parameters
Returns:
The result of the evaluation (null if no value returned)
Throws: JSException
For any error during interpretation

 public Object getMember(String name) throws JSException

Parameters:
name - The name of the property to get
Returns:
The value of the property
Throws: JSException
For any error during interpretation
getSlot 
 public Object getSlot(int index) throws JSException
Implement the get indexed property of this object (useful for arrays).

Parameters:
index - The index value of the property (converted to string if not an array)
Returns:
The value of the property
Throws: JSException
For any error during interpretation

 public void setMember(String name,
                       Object value) throws JSException
Implements the set value of a named property of this object

Parameters:
name - The name of the property to set
value - The value to set the property to.
Throws: JSException
For any error during interpretation
setSlot 
 public void setSlot(int index,
                     Object value) throws JSException
Implement the set property by index value. Useful for arrays.

Parameters:
index - The index of the property in the array.
value - The value to set the property to.
Throws: JSException
For any error during interpretation
makeEvaluator 
 public static JSGlobalObject makeEvaluator() throws JSException
Implement the creation of a new evaluator, with no extension loaded.

Returns:
The global object of the created evaluator.
Throws: JSException
For any error during initialization
makeEvaluator 
 public static JSGlobalObject makeEvaluator(String extensions[]) throws JSException
Implement the creation of a new evaluator, with specfied extensions loaded.

Parameters:
extensions - The class name of the extensions to load.
Returns:
The global object of the created evaluator.
Throws: JSException
For any error during initialization
wrapJSFunction 
 public static ESObject wrapJSFunction(Evaluator evaluator,
                                       JSFunction jsf)
Create a built-in function object from a JSFunction object, so that it can be called as a standard function by native objects. Parameters are transformed in JSobjects if possible Java primitives are are left unhacnged and FESI primitives are transformed to Java primitives.

Parameters:
evaluator - the Evaluator
jsf - The function to wrap
toString 
 public String toString()
Display the string value of the contained object

Returns:
The string value
